argument.name: xBasicFunction
argument.description: The name of the Xbasic function you want to call on the server.

argument.name: additionalData
argument.description: (optional) - any additional data you want to submit. The data in the controls on the Dialog is automatically submitted. This can be used to submit additional data. Specify a string of name/value pairs. e.g. 'data1=value1&data2=value2'

page.description: Does an Ajax callback to a server.
page.discussion: Does an Ajax callback to a server. Data from the Dialog is submitted to the server. It is recommended that you use Action Javascript to write the code for you. Note: The method has several blank arguments in order to keep the method prototype the same as for the Grid component. Use Action Javascript to write the code for you. Dialog Component

section.title: Example
section.description: Use Action Javascript to write the code for you.
